entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.DotNet.Installer.Windows.NullInstallerLogger' to type 'Microsoft.DotNet.Installer.Windows.TimestampedFileLogger' #36757
  • HTTP warnings are not raised in dotnet tool scenarios #36756

Closed

  • `dotnet tool update` gives unfriendly error and stack on not found #36557
    8.0.2xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Add custom props imports around DB.props import Fixes #36749 #36777
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Update Version.Details.xml #36775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure workload install state file has proper ACLs #36676
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, DO NOT MERGE, 8.0.2
  • accept bare version as NuGet exact version for .NET tools #36671
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [release/8.0.2xx] Ensure workload install state file has proper ACLs #36748
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2312062 #36712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36747
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #35173] `--verbosity quiet` suppress success message #36505
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Update stage0 #36621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
